recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick, colorful, and healthy mixed veggies tossed in soy sauce.
ingredients: Broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, soy sauce, garlic, sesame oil.

recipes.title: Paneer Butter Masala
recipes.description: Creamy tomato-based curry with paneer cubes.
ingredients: Paneer, tomato puree, cream, butter, garlic, garam masala.

recipes.title: Aloo Paratha
recipes.description: Stuffed Indian flatbread with spiced potato filling.
ingredients: Wheat flour, boiled potatoes, chili, coriander, ghee.

recipes.title: Chole (Chickpea Curry)
recipes.description: North Indian chickpea curry with rich spices.
ingredients: Chickpeas, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, garam masala.

recipes.title: Palak Paneer
recipes.description: Spinach curry with paneer cubes.
ingredients: Spinach, paneer, garlic, onion, cream, spices.

recipes.title: Vegetable Pulao
recipes.description: Fragrant rice cooked with mixed vegetables.
ingredients: Basmati rice, peas, carrots, beans, cumin, garam masala.

recipes.title: Paneer Tikka
recipes.description: Grilled paneer cubes marinated in spices.
ingredients: Paneer, yogurt, chili powder, turmeric, garam masala.

recipes.title: Vegetable Soup
recipes.description: Light and nourishing soup.
ingredients: Carrots, beans, peas, corn, garlic, vegetable stock

recipes.title: Rajma (Kidney Bean Curry)
recipes.description: Comforting curry with kidney beans.
ingredients: Kidney beans, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, spices.

recipes.title: Vegetable Sandwich
recipes.description: Quick snack with fresh veggies.
ingredients: Bread, cucumber, tomato, onion, butter, chutney.

recipes.title: Vegetable Upma
recipes.description: South Indian semolina dish with veggies.
ingredients: Rava (semolina), carrots, beans, peas, curry leaves.

recipes.title: Vegetable Hakka Noodles
recipes.description: Indo-Chinese noodles with stir-fried veggies.
ingredients: Noodles, cabbage, carrots, beans, soy sauce, garlic.

recipes.title: Vegetable Korma
recipes.description: Rich curry with mixed vegetables in cashew gravy.
ingredients: Carrots, beans, peas, potatoes, cashews, cream, spices.

recipes.title: Vegetable Lasagna
recipes.description: Layered pasta with veggies, tomato sauce, and cheese.
ingredients: Lasagna sheets, spinach, zucchini, tomato sauce, ricotta, mozzarella.

recipes.title: Falafel Wraps
recipes.description: Crispy chickpea patties wrapped in pita bread.
ingredients: Chickpeas, garlic, parsley, cumin, pita bread, tahini sauce.
steps: Fill pita with falafel and veggies.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Refreshing salad with feta and olives.
ingredients: Cucumber, tomato, onion, olives, feta, olive oil, oregano.

recipes.title: Vegetable Sushi Rolls
recipes.description: Japanese rice rolls with fresh veggies.
ingredients: Sushi rice, nori sheets, cucumber, avocado, carrots, soy sauce.

recipes.title: Shakshuka (Veg Version)
recipes.description: Middle Eastern tomato stew with poached eggs (can be made egg-free with tofu).
ingredients: Tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, garlic, paprika, eggs/tofu.

recipes.title: Vegetable Manchurian
recipes.description: Indo-Chinese dish with fried veggie balls in tangy sauce.
ingredients: Cabbage, carrots, flour, soy sauce, garlic, chili sauce.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Colorful peppers filled with spiced rice and veggies.
ingredients: Bell peppers, rice, onion, tomato, peas, cheese.

recipes.title: Vegetable Pakoras
recipes.description: Crispy fritters made with gram flour batter.
ingredients: Onion, potato, spinach, gram flour, chili, turmeric.
steps: Mix veggies with gram flour batter.

recipes.title: Spinach & Corn Sandwich
recipes.description: Creamy spinach and corn filling in toasted bread.
ingredients: Spinach, corn, butter, cheese, bread.

recipes.title: Vegetable Khichdi
recipes.description: Comforting rice and lentil dish with veggies.
ingredients: Rice, moong dal, carrots, peas, turmeric, ghee.

recipes.title: Stuffed Paratha (Mixed Veg)
recipes.description: Indian flatbread stuffed with spiced mixed vegetables.
ingredients: Wheat flour, potatoes, peas, carrots, chili, coriander.
